titles: Proclamation for discovering and apprehending housebreakers, thieves and robbers, and their resetters
author: Scotland. Privy Council.
Eliot, Gilbert, Sir, 1651-1718.
Scotland. Sovereign (1694-1702 : William II)
publisher: Printed by the heir of Andrew Anderson, Printer to his most excellent Majesty,
notes: Dated at end: Given under Our Signet at Edinburgh, the second day of August, and of Our Reign the twelfth year 1700.

Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
keywords: Brigands and robbers --  Scotland --  Early works to 1800.
